function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of financial default","Impact":"Loss of profit, financial instability","Mitigation":"Implement risk assessment models, diversify investment portfolios","Technologies":"Financial modeling tools, risk management software","People":"Bank stakeholders, investors","Owner":"Financial risk management team"},{"Description":"Complex model formulation","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions, flawed risk assessment","Mitigation":"Validation and testing of the model, use of reliable data sources","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, data validation tools","People":"Econometricians, data analysts","Owner":"Research and development team"},{"Description":"Empirical study based on theoretical model","Impact":"Validity of empirical results, reliability of model","Mitigation":"Validation of empirical findings, peer review of the study","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, peer review platforms","People":"Economists, peer reviewers","Owner":"Research team"}]}
